name: MY BREAD STOPS WORKING
description:
MY BREAD STOPS WORKING is a minigames that created for joining Gdevelop Weekend Game Jam June 2022.

liluo.io link:
https://liluo.io/itzmealbert/my-brain-stops-working

How to Play? :
Help Bread to survive against all challenge with total 15 challenge.

Input:
The only input for "My Bread Stops Working" is Between "Tap", "Drag" or "swipe"

Win Condition:
Finish all of the minigames that randomize once you complete some minigames.
with Total 15 Minigames.

Lose Condition:
Health = 0

Engine:
Gdevelop5

Compatibility:
All device which running Browser include Smartphone

Developing Duration:
12 Hours starts from the weekend jam open


KEEP THE BREADS WORK and STAY AWESOME..
I promise you if we win this jam we will add 30 more level
